attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Large cars are some of the safest cars in the world, so why are you trying to make people who own them pay more to use them!!!???
In a crash, a Range Rove will survive much more than a Smart Car or a similar 'City Car'. As the people who own these large cars are families, I can assure you that I would prefer my children to travel in a Range Rover than a Smart Car.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
